cast.name: 蒂姆斯·伯特姆斯 Timothy Bottoms

introduction: The Wild West, long ago: a small town is visited by a band of traveling musicians. They perform on the outskirts of town and face the wrath of a corrupt, power hungry deputy and a burnt out Sheriff (Timothy Bottoms). The lead singer falls in love with the Sheriff's daughter, which only complicates matters as the Deputy wants her for himself. There is also a band of bandits who seems to be working for the Deputy and an ignorant mayor. Part love story, part retro musical 'Hello Stranger...' has action, intrigue, comedy and drama.. It is a unique addition to the Western genre.
